text: Success Power Station is a natural gas-fired station owned by SaskPower, located in Success, Saskatchewan, Canada and operated as a peaking plant. == Description == The Success Station consists of:Plant Description * 1 - 30 MW unit, commissioned in 1967/8 == See also == * SaskPower ==References== == External links == * SaskPower Station Description Category:Natural gas-fired power stations in Saskatchewan Category:SaskPower
title: Success Power Station
